alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kings, Queens, and Nassau Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms extending from Park Slope to The Verrazano Narrows Bridge. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Brooklyn Heights and Park Slope around 320 PM. Flatbush, Crown Heights and Sheepshead Bay around 325 PM. Canarsie and Ozone Park around 330 PM. Rockaway Beach, Forest Hills and Howard Beach around 335 PM. Jamaica and Kennedy Airport around 340 PM. Woodmere, Great Neck, Bayside, Elmont, Cedarhurst, Atlantic Beach and Little Neck around 345 PM. Valley Stream, Long Beach, Garden City, Lynbrook and Manhasset around 350 PM. Mineola, Oceanside, Baldwin, Port Washington and Lido Beach around 355 PM. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
